ONBOARDING.TITLE: Learn how to use ZITADEL
ONBOARDING.LOGINDESC: You need to log in to control your ZITADEL settings.
ONBOARDING.DESCRIPTION: We at ZITADEL care a lot about security and performance. Carry out the following steps and adapt ZITADEL optimally to your needs.
ONBOARDING.STEPS_TITLE: Complete the following steps in the order you want:

1.TITLE: Create a project
1.DESC: Create your first project and define access rights for any employees.

2.TITLE: Create Application
2.DESC: Create an application within your project and define its properties.

3.TITLE: Improve security
3.DESC: Extend the access policies and thereby increase the security of your users.
